[color=#ffff00][head=3]Section 1: Behavior Rules[/head][/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.1[/color] Be respectful to others OOC. *1
[color=#a4885c]1.2[/color] Don't use hate speech, racism, or bigoted comments. *1
[color=#a4885c]1.3[/color] Don't metagame. *1
[color=#a4885c]1.4[/color] Don't spam or advertise. *1
[color=#a4885c]1.5[/color] Do not intentionally take actions that would negatively impact or disrupt others enjoyment of the game. *1
[color=#a4885c]1.6[/color][color=#f1c232] Avoid controversial topics such as self harm/rape in public. *2 [/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.7[/color][color=#f1c232] Don't evade bans. *2 [/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.8[/color][color=#f1c232] Don't self antag. *2 [/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.9[/color][color=#f1c232] Don't ragequit/disconnect to avoid consequences. *2 [/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.10[/color][color=#cc0000] Cheating and exploits are forbidden. *3 [/color]
[color=#a4885c]1.11[/color][color=#cc0000] Respect others consent preferences. *3 [/color]
